title: My Project
description: This is one of the biggest projects I've had the chance to work on

boheme.title: Boheme
boheme.description: Boheme is a school project that aims to improve the traveler experience by providing tools. It is a web application that allows users to create a trip, add activities and places to visit, and share it with others. It also allows users to create a budget and manage it during the trip. The application is built with Vue3, Nuxt3, Django

nftluck.title: NFTLuck
nftluck.description: NFTLuck aimed to be the first NFT casino. It allows users to play casino games by converting their NFT value into chips. Then the user can withdraw their chips and exchange them for NFT. The app is built with React, Next, Express and MongoDB.

urchunk.title: UrChunk
urchunk.description: UrChunk is a web application that allows users to create a chunk of text and share it with other people. It can be viewed as a child between two famous social media platforms: Twitter and Reddit. It aims to be a place for crypto enthusiasts to share their thoughts and ideas. The app is built with React, Next, Django
